entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (nova_orion_flavor_npc_conversation_01b.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_3: Just listen. If you speak with the Humanoid Resources Advisor, you can begin your career with Nova Orion Industries from the beginning. It's great! I've done so twice already, and I'm even thinking of doing so again. It helps me from getting stuck in the same old rut.
